shows.title: Fischy Music
shows.desc:
Come and join Fischy Music in celebrating 20 years as a charity in a concert of songs full of hope and humour along with the usual malarkey. Songs for all ages for the good times and the tough times in life.

Fischy Music’s songs are woven into the fabric of everyday lives of children across the UK.
